title: You have disagreed with the legal statement
pageHeader: You have disagreed with the legal statement
paragraph1: You now need to contact {leadExecFullName} to discuss changing the information they have given.
paragraph2: As soon as {leadExecFullName} updates the information, they should contact you. You will then be able to access the updated legal statement using the same link we emailed you.
subHeader: If you cannot reach an agreement
paragraph3: Probate staff cannot help with any disagreements between applicants. You will need to find another way to reach an agreement, which may include getting legal advice (opens in a new tab).
paragraph4: {leadExecFullName} will not be able to submit the application until all applicants have agreed with the legal statement and made their declaration.
